142261.「ようこそ 旅人さん。\n カシャルに守られし都 ルシュカへ。\n<br>\n「:
Welcome, traveler. Welcome to Ruska, the city protected by Kashal. Soon the Sacrament of Prayer will begin in the
Mystical Coralplaza above. Please join us in prayer.

142379.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「今日の ごは:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Today's gohan is salmon meuniere,
salted squid, and seaweed salad.

142380.「この階段を のぼっていただくと\n 神秘のサンゴがまつられる 広場があります。:
Walking up this stairs, you will find a plaza where the Mystical Coral is enshrined. The Sacrament of Prayer
will soon be open. Please stop by if you are a traveler.

142381.「うちの嫁は ちょっと 外に出るだけなのに \n 化粧したがるんですよね。\n:
My wife wants to put on makeup even though we're just going out for a minute. If I don't hurry, she'll start
praying~.

142382.「アラァ！ アナタ 見かけない顔ですわねぇ！\n わたくしが この町のこと\n:
Oh, you! You are not a familiar face!
I'll tell you all about this town.<bw_break>

142383.「この辺りの海水は フィナさまのチカラで \n 塩分が ごく少量に 抑えられてて:
Thanks to the power of Fina, the salt content of the seawater around here is kept to a very low level, so you can
drink it as it is! Hohoho!

142384.「ルシュカの民は みんな きれい好きですから\n 毎日 海綿のスポンジで\n 身:
Ruska people like to keep clean, so
they scrub their bodies with a sponge
every day! Hohoho!

142385.「ルシュカは はるか昔に 沈んだ都……。\n 地上にあった頃からの 遺跡を\n:
Ruska is a city that sank long ago. We have made the ruins of the city our home since it was above ground!
Hohoho!

142387.「えっ？ 海底の酒場で 何を飲んでいるかって？\n<br>\n「私たちの先祖が:
What? What are we drinking at the tavern at the bottom of the sea? Our ancestors invented a drink called
Umibudo (sea grape wine). It's quite tasty with a crunchy texture.

142389.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「サンゴは 生き:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Because Coral is alive! When you walk
through these STAIRS, you walk softly!

142390.「私は ルシュカで ゆいいつの仕立て屋です。\n おそろいの青いローブ……独特で:
I am a tailor in Ruska. Isn't the matching blue robe unique? This color is dyed from crushed blue coral from
Orphine.

142391.「我ら 青の教団は カシャルへの祈りの中に\n 生きる道を 見いだしました。\n:
We, the Blue Order, have found a way to live in prayer to Kashal. If you cross this bridge and go north, you
will reach the Mystical Coralplaza. There you will see a miracle. Kashal, the holy white dolphin. He who brings
us salvation.

142392.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ここのサンゴ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Coral is our playground! We play
"kenkensupa" (rock-paper-scissors) and
"janpu" (rock-paper-scissors)!

142393.「もうすぐ 祈りの秘跡が おとずれますわ！\n いそいで お化粧しなくっちゃ！\:
The Sacrament of Prayer will be coming soon! I'll have to put on my makeup as soon as possible! Oh, yes, the
cosmetics here in this realm are waterproof!

142394.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ぼくのにいさん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>My brother is staying at Fina's house!
It is the dream of Ruska's children to
be in the Blue Squirrel!

142395.「伝説によりますと……\n はるか昔 どこかに聖なる火の山があり\n 聖鳥と呼ば:
Legend has it that somewhere in the past, there was a mountain of sacred fire and a divine beast called Flamia.
The flame here was given to us by the legendary Flamia before the city sank, and as you can see, it continues to
burn even under water. Since then, it has not died out over the years, and we are still able to live our lives
thanks to this fire.

142396.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あなたは 青の:
Do you know about the Blue Order's head priestess?The Mystic Priestess, also known as Fina-sama! Oh~ I want to
serve the Lady Fina. Like a Koban shark.

142397.「この辺りの空き地は 青の騎士団の\n 訓練場として 使われているのですよ。\n:
The vacant lot around here is used as a training ground for Blue Brigade. Just the other day, we had a heated
hand-to-hand combat. That swordsman who was crossing swords with Commander Dicus... what was his name?

142398.炎は 水の中で 赤々と燃えつづけている。:
The flames continue to burn red in the
water.

142399.墓地の中でも ひときわ大きな\n古びた墓碑がある。:
There is a large old tomb monument in
the graveyard.

142400.「ヒレのある方に 教えていただいたのですが\n 外の世界には コンシェルジュとい:
I was told by someone with a fin that there is a convenient system called "concierge" in the outside world. I
hope you will make use of it! Now then...

142401.「うちの妹が 転職ごっこを 始めるようで。\n どうか 付き合ってやってください:
My sister seems to have started playing the game of changing jobs. Please keep her company. Well, let's
see...

142402.「最近 外の世界からやってきた イケメンさんに \n 転職という仕組みを 教えて:
Recently, a handsome man from the outside world showed me how the job change system works, and I decided to
try to emulate him! So, let's see...

142403.「長い間 変わることのなかった この町に\n ふたたび 異種族の方が おとずれる:
I never thought that this town, which has remained unchanged for so long, would once again be visited by a
foreigner. Baba does not know whether your visit will be for good or for evil.

142404.「カシャルの水門を ごぞんじですか？\n はるか昔 神獣カシャルさまが建てた お:
Are you familiar with the Kashal Water Gate? It was built by the God Beast Kashal a long time ago and is
connected to various places in the Orfine Undersea. The water gate is activated by a special word uttered in
the "Nearby" chat. Once activated, it is a two-way street.

142405.「オイラは 勉強が足りなくって\n 青の騎士団には なれなかったっすけど……\n:
I didn't study hard enough to become a Blue Brigade, but now I am a fisherman at Orfine Sea! This fertile sea is a
great place to catch as much Tuna and squid as you want! Blue Brigade will protect you from sharks!

142406.「……祈りの秘跡は いかがでしたか？\n 我らは あの儀式のおかげで\n このよ:
How about the Sacrament of Prayer? We
can breathe underwater like this
because of that ritual.

142407.「空気を もろに 浴びたせいで\n 嫁のつけまつげが ずれているのですが\n …:
My wife's false eyelashes are out of
alignment because of the air, but I'll
keep quiet about it.

142408.「この先は カシャル海底神殿。\n その奥には 聖なる塔がそびえております。\n:
Beyond this is the Kashal Undersea Temple. Behind it rises the holy tower. For those of you from other
races, please do not cause any unnecessary disturbances. Please do not cause any unnecessary
disturbances.

142411.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「息が いっぱい:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I can breathe so much! I can breathe
in so much!

142413.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「フィナさまの儀:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Fina's ritual was amazing today! It
was amazing today!

142414.「フィナさまのおかげで 新鮮な空気を浴びて\n お肌が ぷるんぷるんですわ！:
Thanks to you, Fina, my skin is so
soft and supple from the fresh air!

142416.「この 神秘のサンゴは 内に空気をためこみ\n フィナさまの術によって 空気を放:
This Mystical Coral stores air inside and releases it through Fina's magic. It is our life, so to speak. We, Blue
Brigade, protect it day and night.

142417.「この町を出ますと あたたかき恵みの海\n オーフィーヌ海底が 広がっております:
Outside of this town, you will find the Orfine Undersea, a warm sea of blessings. If you go further southwest
through the northwestern Sea of Peace, you will come to the cold sea of Gaios Old Sea. Gaios Old Sea is a dangerous
sea. Please do not go too close to it.

142433.「この都について 知りたいのですか？\n それなら ルシュカいちばんの年寄り\n:
You want to know about the city? Then ask Ruska's oldest tomb guardian, Hache. He is a bit of a peculiar old
man, but you should talk to him. The graveyard is in the east of the city.

142434.「この先は カシャル海底神殿。\n 我ら 青の騎士団の 拠点になっております。:
Beyond this is the Kashal Undersea
Temple, which is the base of our Blue
Brigade.

142435.「ぐー……。ぐー……。\n<br>\n「ムニャ……。\n 墓に供える 花束を 作:
Goo. Goo. Muna. I have to make a bouquet of flowers for TomB. Why is the son of a bitch so sleepy? Can't
the kind dwarf make me a bouquet while I'm sleeping? Sooo... Soooo... The undersea daisies in the flower field
at Orfine Undersea. I want to make a bouquet with three colors: red, blue, and yellow. Dwarf, please. Munya.

142436.「ぐー……。ぐー……。\n<br>\n「ムニャ……。\n 墓に供える 花束を 作:
Goo. Goo. Muna. I have to make a bouquet of flowers for TomB. Why is the son of a bitch so sleepy? Oh, kind
gnome. You are holding the Undersea Daisy Bouquet, please give it to the old bastard for the big tomb monument.
Goo. Goo.

142437.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「フィナさま 私:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Fina When she plays with us, she is at
peace and smiles!

142438.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「このまえ フィ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>The other day, I played a role-playing
game with Fina! I played the role of a
lady!

142439.「最近 フィナさまの騎士になられた\n ヒューザさまって方……。\n 無愛想だか:
Recently, a man named Hyuza became a
knight of Fina-sama. I don't like him
because he is so unsociable.

142440.「青の騎士団 ディカス団長と 手合わせしたのは\n ヒューザ殿という 剣士でした:
The one who met with Commander Blue Brigade Dicus was a swordsman named Hyuza-dono! The two swordsmen
exchanged sword blows right then and there, and the decision was made in a split second! The sword tip was thrust
at each other's throats.

142441.墓地の中でも ひときわ大きな\n古びた墓碑がある。\n<br>\n古びた墓碑に:
There is a big old tomb monument in the graveyard. Would you like to put an Undersea Daisy Bouquet on the old
tomb monument?

142443.<pc>は 古びた墓碑に\nそっと 海底デイジーの花束を そなえた。:
<pc> gently placed an
Undersea Daisy Bouquet on the old tomb
monument.

142447.「おや……。 \n この先は ルシュカの墓地になっていて\n 墓守のじいさましか:
Oh, well.It's Ruska's graveyard, and the tomb guard's grandfather is the only one there. That old man knows a
lot, but he's a bit of a difficult man. Be careful when you talk to him.

142448.「この階段を のぼっていただくと\n 神秘のサンゴがまつられる 広場があります。:
If you go up this stairs, you will
find a plaza where Mystical Coral is
enshrined.

142449.「ぐー……。ぐー……。\n<br>\n「ムニャ……。\n フィナさまを ガイオス:
Goo. Goo. Muna. You are going to look for Lady Fina at Gaios Old Sea, aren't you? If your companion comes here,
I'll tell her so. Suya. Suya.

142450.「この町を出ますと あたたかき恵みの海\n オーフィーヌ海底が 広がっております:
Outside of this town, you will find the Orfine Undersea, a warm sea of blessings. Northwest of the seafloor,
past the Sea of Peace, and further southwest is the cold Gaios Old Sea, where you will find the Gaios Old Sea.
Fina just left alone a few minutes ago, is she alright?

142457.古びた墓碑には 海底デイジーの花束が\nそなえられている。:
The old tomb monument is accompanied
by an Undersea Daisy Bouquet.

142466.「フィナさまが お倒れですって……！？\n ということは……タイのおかしらなんて:
Fina, you are down! That means I have
to be able to taste the glamorous
foodstuff like Thai fish balls.

142471.「あぁあ……カシャルの巫女さまに いったい\n 何が 起こったというんです！？\:
What in the world has happened to the
Kashal priestess? We can't live
without her. It's the end.

142472.「フィナさま 倒れちゃったんですの！？\n だ 大丈夫なんですの！？:
Dear Fina, you collapsed! Are you all
right?

142474.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「巫女さまの あのよ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I can't believe I'm seeing a priestess
with such a damaged figure. Mystical
Coral is crying too.

142475.「フィナさまが……フィナさまが……\n お倒れになって カシャル大神殿へ……。\:
Lady Fina went to KashalGreat Temple after Lady Fina collapsed. It seems that she is going to stay in her bed.
Oh, what's going to happen to this town? We must pray for her recovery.

142478.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「さきほど フィ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>A few minutes ago, Fina-sama was
picked up by Hyuza-sama and carried
away! I'm so envious of Hyuza-sama!

142479.「動揺が 広がっておりますねぇ。\n お声は聞こえずとも あの方の優しさは\n:
The turmoil is spreading, isn't it?
Even though we can't hear her voice,
we all know how kind she is.

142480.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「フィナさまを:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Who is the one who bullied Fina-sama?
I'm going to kill him with my harpoon!

142500.「おや……<pc>さま。\n フィナさまが お待ちですよ。\n どうぞ カシャル:
Oh <pc>. Lady Fina is waiting
for you. Please come to the Oratory of
Kashal Undersea Temple.

142505.「ここは カシャルに守られし都 ルシュカ……。 \n あなたを見たら カシャル大:
This is Ruska, the capital protected by Kashal. Blue Brigade told me to tell you to go to KashalGreat Temple
if I see you.

142513.「フィナさまが 本当は神獣カシャルさまなら\n お料理も イルカさんが好きなもの:
If Fina is really God Beast Kashal, then she should serve what the dolphins like to eat! But what exactly
is a dolphin's favorite food?

142514.「フィナさまの お声は はじめて聞いたのに\n どこか 懐かしいような……\n:
Fina's voice had a mysterious resonance that sounded somehow nostalgic, even though it was the
first time I had heard it.

142515.「嫁さんの化粧好きにも こまったものです。\n 素顔の彼女が 好きなんですが\n:
I am also annoyed by my wife's love of makeup. I prefer her without makeup, but she seems to enjoy it, so I guess
it's okay.

142518.「この先は カシャル海底神殿。\n 神獣カシャルである 巫女フィナさまが\n い:
Beyond this is the Kashal Undersea
Temple, where the priestess Fina, the
God Beast Kashal, is located.

142520.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「フィナさまが:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Now that Lady Fina can speak, I'll
sing a song with her!

142521.「私は 若い頃 染料の素材を探しに\n ガイオス古海まで 足を伸ばしておりました:
When I was young, I used to go to Gaios Old Sea to look for materials for dyes. There, I saw Lady Fina
talking to a rotting female idol. She must have been suffering alone for a long time.

142522.「まさか フィナさまが\n 神獣カシャル そのものだったとは……。\n<br>\:
I had no idea that Fina-sama was the God Beast Kashal herself. While protecting Ruska with the power of the
God Beast, she must have also protected our hearts as a priestess.

142523.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ミグラーも フ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Migula wants to be a dolphin like
Fina!

142524.「フィナさまが 神獣でいらっしゃったなんて。\n ということは……あの パッチリ:
I can't believe that you are a divine beast. I wonder if that means that those Patchy eyelashes are made by
some mysterious power!

142526.「この 神秘のサンゴに たくわえられた空気。\n フィナさまが 神獣カシャルのお:
The air that has been worked on this Mystical Coral. It seems that Fina- sama was carrying it from the sea in
the form of God Beast Kashal. I finally understood why I have seen Kashal many times at Orfine Sea.

142527.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ぼくのにいさん:
My brother is a small boy, but he is a very strong and smart man! He's smart and amazing! By the way, my brother's
name is Tet!

142528.「お声を取り戻した フィナさまから \n ルシュカが 沈むことになった事件の\n:
Fina, who has regained her voice, told us the true story of the incident that led to the sinking of Ruska. We will
continue to live in Ruska while accepting the meaning of the incident.

142530.「フィナさまが……フィナさまの正体が……\n 神獣カシャルさまだったなんて……。:
I can't believe that Fina-sama is really God Beast Kashal-sama. Oh~ if only I had been born a Koban shark, we
could have swum in the sea together!

142531.「ヒューザ殿は 青の騎士団を\n 去ってしまったのですね。\n 剣の技を もっと:
I see that Hyuza-dono has left Blue
Brigade. I would have liked to learn
more about the art of swordsmanship.

142536.「あなた方の訪れは このルシュカにとって\n 大きな転機の きざしだったんですね:
Your visit was a turning point for
Ruska.

142537.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「フィナさまが:
Whether Fina is a dolphin or a whale, it doesn't matter! As long as Fina- sama lives with me, I will catch lots
of fish today and continue my unchanged life!

144811.岩でできた そぼくな墓が\n水底に ひっそりと たたずんでいる。:
A simple tomb made of rock quietly
lies at the bottom of the water.

144812.岩でできた そぼくな墓が\n水底に ひっそりと たたずんでいる。\n<br>\n:
A shabby tomb made of rock is lying quietly at the bottom of the water. found something glowing
Kirari at his feet! receives a Mini Medal!

144813.岩でできた そぼくな墓が\n水底に ひっそりと たたずんでいる。:
A simple tomb made of rock quietly
lies at the bottom of the water.

150472.「今 このカシャルの水門では\n 『みのり』という 言葉だけが\n 解放されてい:
At the Kashal Water Gate, the word "Minori" is the only word that is open. You can only fly to one place
with one word. If you go to Orfine Undersea and visit the water gates in each area and free up words, you will
be able to go to more places. There are many strong monsters in Orfine Undersea, and no one in the history of
Orfine Undersea has managed to liberate all of the Kashal Water Gates. If you free all the water
gates, I will give you three Golden Petals, our family's heirlooms, as a warning! First of all, please shout
the word "Minori" in the "Nearby" chat. This will signal the release of each sluice.

150473.「さて カシャルの水門や 移動先について\n 私から もうすこし ご説明しましょ:
Now, let me explain a little more
about the Kashal Water Gate and where
we are going.
<select>
What is Kashal Water Gate?
Sea of Worth
Stop
<select_end>

<break>

<case_end>

150474.「そうですか。私は ここにおりますので \n いつでも おたずねください。:
I see. I'm here, so feel free to ask
for me anytime.

150475.「晴れの海に結びつく言葉は 『よろこび』……。\n オーフィーヌ海底の 南に位置:
The word associated with Sea of Light is "joy". It is a warm and welcoming place located south of Orfine
Undersea.

150476.「豊かの海に結びつく言葉は 『みのり』……。\n オーフィーヌ海底の 東に位置す:
The word associated with Sea of Worth is "Minori". It is a beautiful place where undersea flowers bloom, located
east of Orfine Undersea.

150477.「迷いの海に結びつく言葉は 『ためらい』……。\n オーフィーヌ海底の 西に位置:
The word associated with Sea of Doubt is "hesitation. Located west of Orfine Undersea is a fantastic place with
lots of Jellyfish.

150478.「静かの海に結びつく言葉は 『しあわせ』……。\n オーフィーヌ海底の 北西に位:
The word associated with the Sea of Peace is "Happiness. It is located northwest of Orfine Undersea, a
fertile place with flowing ocean currents.

150479.「眠りの海に結びつく言葉は 『えいえん』……。\n オーフィーヌ海底の 南西に位:
The word that is associated with Sea of Sleep is "Eien". It is a desolate place with ancient ruins located
southwest of Orfine Undersea.

150480.「我ら 青の教団は カシャルへの祈りの中に\n 生きる道を 見いだしました。\n:
We, the Blue Order, have found a way to live in prayer to Kashal. Kashal, the holy white dolphin. He who brings
us salvation.

150481.「フィナさまは 泣く子がいれば\n そっと 寄りそうような お方……。\n<br:
If there is a crying child, Fina-sama is the kind of person who gently leans on it. This Baba also leaned on me.
Heh heh heh heh.

150494.「カシャルの水門の 移動先について\n 私から ご説明しましょうか？\n<sel:
Shall I explain to you where the
Kashal Water Gate is moving to?
<select>
What is Kashal Water Gate?
Sea of Worth
Stop
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

150678.「おや……どうやら オーフィーヌ海底で \n カシャルの水門を解放し\n 特別な:
Well, it seems that you have freed the Kashal Water Gate at Orfine Undersea and obtained a special word. If you
shout the word in the chat "Nearby", the gate will activate and you will be transported to the location that
matches the word. Would you like me to tell you where to go?

150679.「おや……どうやら オーフィーヌ海底で \n カシャルの水門を解放し\n 特別な:
Well, it seems that you have freed the Kashal Water Gate at Orfine Undersea and obtained a special word. If you
shout the word in the chat "Nearby", the gate will activate and you will be transported to the location that
matches the word. Would you like me to tell you where to go?

150680.「おや……どうやら オーフィーヌ海底で \n カシャルの水門を解放し\n 特別な:
Well, it seems that you have freed the Kashal Water Gate at Orfine Undersea and obtained a special word. If you
shout the word in the chat "Nearby", the gate will activate and you will be transported to the location that

153260.「私は 青の騎士団の 炊飯係です。\n 町を守るためには 健康な身体づくりも\n:
I am the cook for Blue Brigade. In order to protect the town, a healthy body is essential. The terrace of this
tavern is spacious and open, and Blue Brigade often uses it as a dining room. At lunchtime, there is even a
duel among the knights over the famous Jellyfish rice.

153262.<center>カシャルの水門は 言葉によりて 導かれし場所へ\nとなえた者を運:

they are to go. Open the gate. First, say the word of initiation, "Minori" here. When the first word is said, the
Kashal Water Gate will begin to move.

153263.<center>水門の石碑から 不思議な声が聞こえてきた。\n<br>\n今この:
A mysterious voice came from the stone monument of the water gate. From this moment on, all Kashal Water Gates will
answer your call. Release all words around the gates that lie in the Orfine Undersea.

153267.<icon_exc>「おお！ あなたは……オーフィーヌ海底にある\n すべての:
Oh! You have liberated all the Kashal Water Gates in Orfine Undersea! My family has been watching over the
water gates for a long time, but you are the first to release all of them. Now the people of Ruska will be able
to move around with ease and joy. Please accept this in return.

153268.「しかし あなたのどうぐかばんは\n いっぱいのようですね。\n 余裕ができまし:
But your item bag seems to be full.
Please talk to me again when you have
more time.

153269.「ここにある カシャルの水門は\n はるか昔 神獣カシャルさまが残した 遺構で\:
The Kashal Water Gate here is a relic left behind by the God Beast Kashal long ago and is connected to various
locations in the Orfine Undersea. The water gates are activated by special words uttered in the "Nearby" chat
room. The word is obtained by releasing the sluice gates located throughout the Orfine Undersea. Try to
find them at the bottom of the sea.

153270.キラキラと かがやくサンゴが\nたえず 空気を 放出している。:
The shimmering coral is constantly
releasing air.

153271.「おや？ もしや ハチェじいに頼まれて\n 海底デイジーを お探しですか？\n<:
Hmm? Are you looking for an undersea daisy for Hacheji? If so, please use the Kashal Water Gate here. It is a
shortcut to the place where undersea daisies bloom.

153582.<center>カシャルの水門は 言葉によりて 導かれし場所へ\nとなえた者を運:
Kashal Water Gate is a mysterious shrine that carries those who are guided by the word to the place where
they are to go. Open the gates, all gates await their release. All the gates are waiting for the time of
liberation.

153583.<center>カシャルの水門は 言葉によりて 導かれし場所へ\nとなえた者を運:
Kashal Water Gate is a mysterious shrine that carries those who are guided by the word to the place where
they are to go. He who opens all the gates. The Water Gate will answer your words and carry you where you wish.

153607.「和みの海に結びつく言葉は 『やすらぎ』……。\n オーフィーヌ海底の 南東に位:
The word associated with the Sea of Unity is "tranquility. It is located southeast of Orfine Undersea, a calm
place with a large shell.

154224.「あら……？ あなたは もしや\n 海底デイジーを 探しておられるのですか？\n:
Oh? Are you, by any chance, looking for an underwater daisy? If so, you should definitely use the shortcut at
the Kashal Water Gate in this town. Please ask Wowora at the southwest corner of town how to use it.

157585.「アラァ！ アナタ このわたくしに\n 何か 頼みがある顔してますわねぇ？<ye:
Oh, my God! You look like you need
something from me, don't you?<yesno><break>

157586.「そうよ そうなのよぉ！\n あの子ったら 隠れてサンゴのそうじしてるの！\n<:
That's right, that's right! She's been cleaning Coral behind my back! She's easily misunderstood because of her
scary face, but she's always been too serious since she was a little girl. Her father died early, and she became
a Knight Commander at the age of 15. Everyone was worried about her. You probably don't know this, but the
Knight Commander of this town is like the mayor. And since the time when Ruska sank, the family of Commander
Dicus has been the successor to the Knight Commander. I heard that he started to say that he would take over
the position of Commander with a sense of responsibility even though he was young, but I'm sure there must have
been some hard times inside. I'm sure she overcame that and now she's become the face of the Knight Commander. I'm
too old to have loose lachrymal glands. That's right! And Commander Dicus...

157587.「アラァ！ わたくしったら\n ずいぶんと 話しすぎてしまいましたわぁ！\n そ:
Oh, no! I've been talking too much! I know, I wanted Whelk Sponge. Here it is, the famous water-soluble Whelk
Sponge, perfect for cleaning!

157588.「また わたくしと お話ししたくなったら\n いつでも来てくださいねぇ！ 待って:
If you ever want to talk to me again,
please come anytime! I'll be waiting
for you!

157589.「騎士団長だった お父さまを 早くに亡くされて \n １５歳で 騎士団長の座に就:
Your father, who was a Knight Commander, died early, and you became a Knight Commander at the age of 15. I
never thought that a little Commander would become such a great man. Oh, Did you want to hear my
story even more?

157591.「あおのきしだんの ひとたちも\n だいおういかをやっつけたり ゴミをひろったり:
The members of the Blue Rhinoceros Order are also very good-natured, defeating the Great King and digging
up trash! Even Brother Tet seems to be careful about the Dicus chief! Oh, it's Calm Shell, isn't it? You see,
I'm a shell-hunting genius! Oh, no! Calm Shells are a rare, primitive shellfish found only once every other
year or so! You'll probably find them around the tranquil waters of the Orpheine Sea this year!

157592.それからも しばらく\nファンテの長話が つづいた……。\n<br>\n<pc>:
Fante's long talk continued for a
while after that. <pc> began
to feel sleepy.

157593.<pc>は ファンテから\nホエホエ海綿（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<pc> received Whelk Sponge
(Key Item) from Fante!<me 60>

157594.これで ディカス団長のメモに書かれていた\nすべての道具が そろった！\n神秘の:
Now that we have all the tools
mentioned in Commander Dicus' Note,
let's go clean up the Mystical Coral!

157595.<pc>は ファンテの長話を\nえんえんと 聞かされた……。:
<pc> was regaled with Fante's
long story.

157597.キラキラと かがやくサンゴが\nたえず 空気を 放出している。\n<br>\nデ:
The shimmering coral is constantly releasing air. Would you like to clean the Mystical Coral as per Commander
Dicus' Note?

157598.<pc>は ディカス団長のメモに書かれた\nそうじの仕方の部分を よく 読んでみ:
<pc> read carefully the part
of Commander Dicus' Note on how to
clean up.

157599.まずは わかめ由来石けんを 花びらほどの\n薄さに削り 手のひらに乗せて\n両手:
First, shave Seaweed Soap to the thickness of a flower petal, place it in the palm of your hand, and whip it
softly as if you were enveloping it with both hands. When the foam and seawater are well mixed, gently apply
the foam to the surface of the coral using the flexing of the wrist. After the foam has been applied to the
entire coral, smooth the coral with a Whelk Sponge. After lathering the entire coral, smooth the coral with
the Whelk Sponge, again being careful not to break the coral. Carefully wipe off any dimples. The process is
complete when all the lather has been removed.

157600.<pc>は メモの通りに\n一生懸命 サンゴをそうじした！<bw_break>:
<pc> worked hard to clean
Coral as per the note!<bw_break>

157602.……しかし カーム貝が余ってしまった。\nそうじが終わったことを テトに 報告し:
But I have an extra Calm Shell. I'll
report to Tet that the cleanup is
finished!

157603.「おとなって どうして みんな\n すなおに なれないんでしょうね！\n<br>:
Why is it that all grown-ups can't be so obedient? Dancho, Fina-sama, and even the really kind Teto-brother are
all bumptious.

157916.<attr><feel_normal_silent><end_attr>「………:
<attr><feel_normal_silent><end_attr>The following is a list of the most
common problems with the

157917.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「……はっ！ すみません。\n ついつい:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Ha! Sorry. I got caught up in my
thoughts.<bw_break>

157918.「そうですか……。 \n 本当に 興味深いのに……残念だなぁ。:
I see.That's too bad, because it's
really interesting.

157919.「では 教えてさしあげましょう！ \n なんとなんと 私の家系は 遠い昔\n 海:
Well, let me tell you!My family used to be pirates a long time ago! In the diary, my ancestors received many
treasures, but there was one item that caught my attention. There was one particular detail that caught my
attention... that the last great pirate Megella was willing to give up all his wealth to receive... a
treasure that he was willing to receive. But somehow, there's a very detailed description of this treasure
that's missing, and I can't help but wonder what it is. According to the diary, the Great Pirate Megella
disappeared on the Gaios Old Sea in pursuit of the treasure, but the cause of his disappearance is still unknown.
What in the world could have happened?Was it a cursed treasure? From the looks of it, you seem to be
pretty good at what you do. You may be able to solve this mystery! I'm sorry to ask this out of the blue, but could
you please go to Gaios Old Sea and find out about the hidden treasure?

157920.「おお 引き受けてくれるのですね！\n ありがとうございます！\n<br>\n「:
Oh, you'll take care of it! Thank you
very much! Gaios Old Sea is a
dangerous sea, please be careful.

157921.「……お気持ちは うれしいのですが\n 他にも たくさん 頼まれごとがあって\n:
I appreciate your concern, but you seem to be busy with many other requests. Could you come back after
you've sorted out a few things? I'll be waiting for you!

157922.「そ…そうですよね……。\n 無理を言って すみませんでした……。:
That's right. I'm sorry for asking for
so much.

157923.<turn_pc>「私の遠い先祖 最後の大海賊マゼラが \n すべての財宝を な:
I heard that there was a treasure that my distant ancestor, the last great pirateMegella, was willing to give up
all his wealth to receive.

157924.「最近 夫と話していても \n どういうわけか 生返事ばかりなんです。\n この:
For some reason, when I talk to my husband these days, he always gives me a curt answer. At this rate, I'm
entering the kentai period! I need to put on more makeup, become prettier, and get my husband to be interested in
me!

157925.「私の遠い先祖 最後の大海賊マゼラが \n すべての財宝を なげうってでも\n:
I heard that there was a treasure that my distant ancestor, the last great pirateMegella, was willing to give up
all his wealth to receive.

157926.「でも どういうわけか その秘宝に関してだけ\n くわしい記述が 抜け落ちていて:
But somehow, a detailed description of the treasure is missing, and I can't help but wonder about its true
identity. According to the diary, the Great Pirate Megella disappeared on the Gaios Old Sea in pursuit of the
treasure, but the cause of his disappearance is still unknown. I'm sorry to ask this out of the blue, but
could you please go to Gaios Old Sea and investigate? Please do!

157927.「大海賊マゼラが 追い求めていた\n 秘宝について 何か わかりましたか？:
Did you find out anything about the
treasure that the great pirate Megella
was after?

157928.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「いったい どん:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>What kind of treasure was it? I can't
help but be curious!

157929.「なんと……！ \n 秘宝は ウェディという異種族が 信仰していた\n マリーヌ:
What a surprise!The treasure was a statue of the goddess Marine, who was worshipped by Weddie, a different
races! What?The pirate fell in love with the statue and was trying to get it? If it's a statue of such a
beautiful woman, I'd like to see it too, even if it's only once.

157930.<icon_exc>「そ…そりゃあ もちろん 君のことだよ！ \n この方に 美:
Oh, yes, of course, I was talking about you!I was just bragging to this guy about what a beautiful wife you
have!

157931.「ふう……\n うちの嫁は ちょっと\n 心配性なところがあるんですよ。\n<b:
My wife is a bit of a worrier. That aside, thank you very much for looking into the hidden treasure! Please
accept this in return.

157932.「心から愛するものの 価値というのは\n 他人には わからないものですよね。\n:
The value of something you love with all your heart is something that others cannot understand. I guess for
me, that would be my wife. Please listen to what I just said.

157934.「あら あなたったら<heart>\n お客さまに のろけるのも\n ほどほどに:
Oh, honey... you'd better stop
flirting with the customers.

157935.秘宝について 調べたことを\nブルグに 伝えますか？<yesno><case 1:
Do you want to tell Burg what you
found out about the hidden treasure?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

157937.「心から愛するものの 価値というのは\n 他人には わからないものですよね。\n:
The value of something you love with all your heart is something that others cannot understand. I guess for
me, that would be my wife. Please listen to what I just said.

157938.「夫が 私の魅力に 気づいてくれましたの♪\n お化粧の甲斐が ありましたわ！: My husband found me very attractive!

158041.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「じつは この:
I was cleaning out my room the other day and came across my great-great- grandfather's diary. The contents were
very interesting. Hmm? You seem to be interested, too. Would you like to know what kind of diary it was?

158042.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「でも どうい:
But somehow, a detailed description of the treasure is missing, and I can't help but wonder about its true
identity. According to the diary, the Great Pirate Megella disappeared on the Gaios Old Sea in pursuit of the
treasure, but the cause of his disappearance has never been revealed. What in the world could have
happened?Was it a cursed treasure? From the looks of it, you seem to be pretty good at what you do. You may be
able to solve this mystery! I'm sorry to ask this out of the blue, but could you please go to Gaios Old Sea and
find out about the hidden treasure?

158722.いつにもまして キラキラと かがやくサンゴが\nたえず 空気を 放出している。:
Coral, ever more shimmering and
dazzling, is constantly releasing air.

159540.「……マァマァ！\n ホエホエ海綿が ほしいのですねぇ。\n いいわいいわ いく:
Oh, mmmm...! You want Whelk Sponge. I'll give you all the Whelk Sponge you want. But usually Commander Dicus
comes.

159541.しかし まわりこまれた！\n<pc>は ファンテの長話を\nえんえんと 聞かされ:
However, they were intercepted!
<pc> was forced to listen
to Fante's long story.

159543.「あれれ かんちがいでしたかっ！: Oh, no, I must have misunderstood!

159544.「ははあ テト兄さんの たのみごとですか。\n <pc>さんも おひとよしですね:
Ha-ha-ha...you are doing brother Tet's bidding, huh? is also good-natured, isn't he? The members of
the Blue Rhinoceros Order are also very good-natured, too, as they have been defeating the Great Pumpkin and
digging up trash! Even Brother Tet seems to be careful about the Dicus leader! Oh, it's Calm Shell, isn't it?
You see, I'm a shell-hunting genius! Oh, no! Calm Shells are a rare, primitive shellfish found only once
every other year or so! You'll probably find them around the tranquil waters of the Orpheine Sea this year!

179249.「他の領界から 旅人さんがいらっしゃるなら\n ルシュカの おさかな料理を た～:
If you are a traveler from another
realm, I hope you enjoy Ruska's fish
dishes.

179250.「フィナさまは お声を取り戻してから\n よく笑い よくおしゃべりをされています:
Fina has been laughing and talking a lot since she got her voice back. I was surprised because I thought she
had little emotion.

179251.「ナドラガ神との 決戦の時には\n 六神の神獣さまが つどったそうですね。\n<:
I heard that the six divine beasts attended the decisive battle with Nadraga. It must have been a
spectacular sight.

179252.「これからは ナドラガンドの各地から\n 竜の民が この町を 訪れるだろうって\:
Fina told me that dragon people from all over Nadragand will be visiting this town! We must teach these
travelers how to breathe well in the water!

179253.「フィナさまが エジャルナの大神殿の\n パーティーで 踊っておられたんですって:
I heard that Lady Fina was dancing at a party at the Great Temple in Ejarna. Ah~ but only Dicus was able to see
her. I am so envious!

179254.「ヒューザ殿は この先も\n 放浪の旅を 続けるそうですね。\n いつか 剣を交:
I hear that you will continue your
wandering journey. I would like to
cross swords with him someday.

179255.「あなたの訪れは このルシュカだけでなく\n ナドラガンドにとって\n 大きな転:
Your visit was a turning point not
only for Ruska, but also for
Nadragand.
